title: How Cilantro removes most of heavy metals from your body?
description: Heavy metals can take a massive toll on your body, health and well-being. Heavy metals such as mercury, nickel, uranium, cadmium, lead and aluminum, are able to imbed themselves into our central nervous systems and bones, accumulating for years and can slow you down mentally and physically. They are suspected of triggering dangerous conditions like heart disease, thyroid problems, dementia, neurological conditions, Alzheimer's, depression, anemia, autism, infertility and birth defects. Heavy metal detox can remove these toxins from your body and minimize their impact on your health.
